website_summaries.verdict: With an amazing picture that matches but doesn't exceed LG's 2017 OLED TVs, the Sony XBR-A1E isn't worth the premium for most high-end shoppers.
pros: With the exception of other 2017 OLED TVs, the Sony XBR-A1E outperforms every other TV we've tested
It delivers perfect black levels, wide viewing angles, accurate color and a great bright-room picture
Its unique stand-less design is almost all picture when seen from the front
cons: It has the same image quality as less expensive LG OLED TVs

customer_reviews.title: Worst product I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: A terrible purchase. I got scammed by Sony. Potential customers be aware. I bought the TV new. It was defective on arrival. Contacted Sony as instructed. They replaced the TV with a 2 year old refurbished TV (which has vertical banding on screen. Sony will do nothing about this. Expected when gets old !) Warranty is useless. Essentially paid full price for a 2 year old defective refurbished TV. Complete scam. Be aware of Sony tactics. Recommend stay away low quality company. If you decide to buy Sony good luck its a gamble as the warranty is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AFTER ANDROID SOFTWARE UPDATE DO A FACTORY RESET!
customer_reviews.text: ***IMPORTANT*** AFTER ANDROID SOFTWARE UPDATE DO A FACTORY RESET! AFTER ANDROID SOFTWARE UPDATE DO A FACTORY RESET! AFTER ANDROID SOFTWARE UPDATE DO A FACTORY RESET! Anyone complaining about a sluggish response in the menus, please do this before you say anything. It works fine if you do a factory reset post upgrade. This is standard Android major version upgrade procedure so it shouldn't be any different for a TV. Overall, I am loving this TV so far!
customer_reviews.author: Seath

customer_reviews.title: How Good Is It??
customer_reviews.text: In two words - IT’S AWESOME! As long as the transmission is UHD, you will be stunned by the picture, and sound without a speaker ... yeah just makes it better. Wonderful technology from a cutting-edge manufacturer! THANK YOU, Sony! Tomorrow I’ll hook-up the PS4’s VR. That should be JUST as mind blowing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Theis

customer_reviews.title: The best out there right now if you want to pay the price.
customer_reviews.text: This TV is the bomb. My former Sony just didn’t have enough brightness to distinguish animate objects in dark scenes or at night. This TV let’s you see it all. No more squinting! A lot of side features. I did by use the speakers but they have a better than average sound that doesn’t come Friday m traditional speakers. The screen is the speaker. I use my KEF LS50 wireless speakers for the audio. It’s 4K but there is very little 4K content out there.
customer_reviews.author: slowbutsure

customer_reviews.title: The best OLED picture bigger than 65”, period.
customer_reviews.text: With the latest firmware update, Dolby Vision support is decent and the Cinema Pro picture setting is close enough to professional calibration quality. Getting this on warehouse clearance is a relative bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hargett

customer_reviews.title: The TV itself looks beautiful and the graphic looks stunning with 4K HDR
customer_reviews.text: The TV itself looks beautiful and the graphic looks stunning with 4K HDR. It even makes your regular HD movies look better with the added power compared with the old models. Definitely five stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alcerio

customer_reviews.title: The best TV you can buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the best TV that you can buy. It is definitely better than the LG E7 which I have tried out both. The picture quality on the A1E is second to none. The tilt on the TV is great as it makes the picture appear even bigger. When you see an old movie on this TV it is like you are watching it for the first time. The sound is amazing when viewing close distances. The build quality and design is fantastic. Just buy the TV and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Sony A1E 65"
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful TV. I own a Pioneer Elite Kuro (50") and Sharp Elite (70"), both working, and this is of course better with OLED, 4K, etc. It has a very high quality build. Amazing images and very impressed by Sony's audio innovation (sound comes from screen). Barely fit on my TV stand, but solid base is very stable. The slight lean backwards is not noticeable. Only nit is that I wish the remote was backlit and the play/pause buttons are too small--not a good design for cord cutters and Android TV. (I have three other Sony's with same remote, which is otherwise nice.). Wish I could afford the 77" version.
customer_reviews.author: bkamem

customer_reviews.title: Without question, the finest UHD TV there is.
customer_reviews.text: Incredible TV. Build quality, audio and video quality, ease of use, all without peer. There is a reason that SONY is a premium brand. You get what you pay for, and this is the best TV we have ever purchased. Also, the easel stand is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Munroe

customer_reviews.title: Best TV I Have Ever Owned.
customer_reviews.text: Wow.... just wow. I love this thing. Vivid vivid vivid colors and blacks. Sound is amazing. People ask me where it is coming from when they hear it and are shocked when I say, it's coming from the screen. You have to see it and hear it to believe it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing picture quality and well worth the money. Not much more to say. Outperforms QLED in almost every way.
customer_reviews.author: PDitty

customer_reviews.title: Best tv on the market so far.
customer_reviews.text: if you are serious about having the best tv out there for 2018, this s it, I can tell out how pleased I am with this tv, its quite simply the best there is period,
customer_reviews.author: harry n greenlee

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This TV is so clear, it will literally change your life. It’s pricey, but we felt it was worth the price for such crisp and clear picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound built in
customer_reviews.text: WOW on the picture. Very good sound built in. Does not play well with Bose Lifestyle 650 system (or vice versa - don't know where the problems come from).
customer_reviews.author: John Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful television--probably cheaper now
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful television--probably cheaper now. Don't consider buying a soundbar. Sound is built in. (Google it. Woofer is built into the stand. Sound (believe it) comes from the screen, built into quadrants. Yes: it's cheaper now, but still expensive:  We love it. Our last TV.
customer_reviews.author: ERB

customer_reviews.title: Very good TV
customer_reviews.text: the TV is awesome. The picture and sound are very good. A little expensive but It’s a great tv.
customer_reviews.author: Jsmooth

customer_reviews.title: Wow !!
customer_reviews.text: This is one kick ass sweet TV !! Got it Feb 2018 wanted to use it for months before I submit a review .... pic quality is insane the “ “Black” colors will blow ur mind and the sound is an A+ you don’t even need a sound bar ....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Getting ready for the 4k future
customer_reviews.text: Sony is setting the standard for high quality again. The A1e is better than the LG signature series and Samsung qled series.picture quality is excellent and the sound is great for just tv speakers built on the screen .sony should just fix the os and make it more user friendly because android always have glitches .
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is Stunning! Very nice! TV. Worth all the money. Sony XBR A1E is by far one of the best OLED out their.I would recommend and buy again! Good job! Sony....
customer_reviews.author: robert c.

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Oled TV
customer_reviews.text: This tv is great and fulfill my expectations, especially with 1080p and 480p contents. I wall mount this, so the stand didn't affect me at all. The android OS is buggy and not responsive, but i dont want to remove any star for that. You can avoid android if you have apple tv etc... Apple TV and Oppo player is a must if you want to enjoy the max performance of this TV IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Solaris

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture and sound. Outstanding! Sony remains on top of the heap.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Faye

customer_reviews.title: I think one of the best TVs on the market
customer_reviews.text: I think one of the best TVs on the market. Perfect picture. Perfect design Superior sound. Nevertheless I was able to connect a sub-woofer directly to the TV. This was all it took to have a cinematic surround feeling created.Super fast smart TV functions. Only annoying thing is the google assistant. It doesn't seem to support TV function very well. Instead it is always proposing some kind of youtube videos. Would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Westerheide

customer_reviews.title: Sony nailed it, Samsung needs to pick up
customer_reviews.text: Amazing ! Simply Amazing, Thank you Amazon for putting this in one of the best TVs, delivered right into my room and fitted, the customer experience is amaxing. Coming to the picture quality, sound processing and even everything, the details and quality Sony made into a master peice it's simply worth the money, Best TV ever ! Kudos Sony and Amazon team! Thank you A happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Vish

customer_reviews.title: Infinite Contrast and Outstanding Upscaling
customer_reviews.text: Awesome picture, a bit difficult getting to the HDMI ports, but otherwise a fantastic unit we're enjoying daily.
customer_reviews.author: RocketMan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tv no doubts the oled Makes a big difference
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Prominent red-pixel cluster on screen
customer_reviews.text: Just received my unit and there is a prominent red cluster of pixels on the screen. Power cycling, input changes, multiple attempts does NOT clear it. I am waiting on my replacement. If that unit doesnt have this defect, I will up my review.
customer_reviews.author: slim

customer_reviews.title: Dream TV
customer_reviews.text: Amazing TV - great picture quality . Spending lots of time watching and soooo happy!
customer_reviews.author: Madame Baloy

customer_reviews.title: The innovative sound system is only good..
customer_reviews.text: The default settings are not adequate either in video or audio. Need to spend lots of time to tweak it to the surroundings. The innovative sound system is only good...not as good as I had hoped it would be. Sometimes it's very 'muddy'. While the picture is great once it's tweaked, and the sound is only good, I can't recommend this product given the price. In short, I am somewhat disappointed and would not buy one again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my A1 with its great color and deepest black levels...Sports and movies look wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro C.

customer_reviews.title: Unfotunatly the TV stopped working first day after around 2-3 hours
customer_reviews.text: Unfotunatly the TV stopped working first day after around 2-3 hours of 4K content watching through Sony Blue Ray player x800 .. The amazon support was good though - Sony , please don't compremize on quality ... we trust he brand a lot in terms on picture & build quality..
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: May or may not work for your wall mounted install
customer_reviews.text: This review only covers my experience with doing a wall mounted installation. Because of the way that Sony designed the TV, the guts of the of TV extend 3" behind the back edge of the screen. The average low profile tilt wall mount will put your TV between 2 3/4" - 3" from the wall. That means when you mount this TV, the back of the screen is right around 6" from the wall. Having the display that far into the room didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Adam M.

customer_reviews.title: do not buy. used 12 weeks, 2 days ...
customer_reviews.text: do not buy. used 12 weeks, 2 days each week, total 24 days,130 hours television went dead, no picture no sound no internet connection. checked out rear of set an d found 4 long cracks from top to center of back tube.
customer_reviews.author: donald yarnell

customer_reviews.title: Delivery misrepresentation.
customer_reviews.text: Company represented that delivery would be by TWO people on account of dimension of TV. Delivery was by ONE person. Very difficult. Driver/delivery person was very personable, but did not know how to set the unit up. Because of weight and dimensions, I had to assist him in putting the unit on cabinet. Misrepresentation in ad about delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Best TV in the world!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best advancement in LED category TV! This display is 35% better than the LG sets, and the picture is now the gold standard for color saturation and blacks. Buy this set, you will NOT be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Black

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great Picture. Picture will turn black for a second. I think something wrong with processor. I would wait on this tv. This tv has lot of issues. Do not buy now. Maybe they will fix later.
customer_reviews.author: Goldfinger

product_meta.title: Sony 65 BRAVIA OLED 4K HDR TV (XBR65A1E)
product_meta.description: Size:65-Inch| Style:TVTrue reality comes to life with perfect black and color. Sony's OLED TV creates exquisite, unprecedented contrast with over 8 million precisely and individually controlled self-illuminating pixels. Immerse yourself completely in the entertainment with sound that comes from the entire screen, with the world’s first Acoustic Surface.
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (Alexa device sold separately).
Dimensions (W x H x D): TV without stand: 57.3" x 32.9" x 3.5", TV with stand: 57.3" x 32.9" x 13.4"
Smart functionality gives you access to your favorite apps and content using Sony’s Android TV. Power Requirements: (voltage):AC 120V for UL cUL AC 110-240V for other
Pairs 4K Ultra HD picture clarity with the contrast, color, and detail of High Dynamic Range (HDR) for the most lifelike picture.
The OLED panel’s native 120Hz refresh rate is enhanced by Motionflow XR gives you the fast moving action scenes with no motion blur.
Currently supports HDR10 & HLG (with latest software). Can support Dolby vision in future updates.

In the box: Voice Remote Control (RMF-TX201U), Batteries (R03), AC Power Cord Spec (US, 2pin, flat blades, Polarity), IR Blaster (1-849-161-12), Operating Instructions, Quick Setup Guide / Supplement CUE (GA), Table Top Stand (Separate, assemble required)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars127 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
